reviewText: If I were you, I'd wait because a much better collection is on its way (roughly Dec. 2014).Sam Nelson (Ricky Nelson's son) is actually raising money to restore the entire 435-episode series of "The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet" and include the original commercials too!  He hopes to have the entire series restored by the time "The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet" is inducted into the Smithsonian.
summary: Wait!  A Better Collection is Coming!!
Title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet: Volumes 1-5

reviewText: Super fun and clean humor.  Again, nostalgia for our earlier years. Clever way they slip in advertisements at beginning and end of show.
Title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet: Volumes 1-5

reviewText: i watched this tv show during the 50's and 60's. i grew up with ricky nelson. i loved to listen to his records. since i have amazon prime i got free shipping on this product. watching this tv show will transport you back to a time when things were simpler. amazon has lots of vintage tv shows. check them out. happy shopping. aloha haleiwa jon
Title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet: Volumes 1-5

reviewText: These episodes of the Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet are as much fun and as timely now as they were in the 1950s when I was a child. Human nature doesn't change and the humor that accompanies family situations is funny from generation to generation. Clever dialogue, humor, and good clean fun for the whole family.
summary: Timeless Ozzie and Harriet Episodes and
Title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet: Volumes 1-5

reviewText: They don't make them like this any more and never will.  We have all three sets and love them all.
summary: They don't make them like this any more
Title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet: Volumes 1-5
